description.zh: 微软研究院发布的研究数据集，涵盖 NLP、计算机视觉、社交网络等领域
description.en: Research datasets released by Microsoft Research, covering NLP, computer vision, social networks and more

authority_justification.zh: 微软研究院官方发布，包含多个被广泛引用的基准数据集
authority_justification.en: Officially released by Microsoft Research, includes widely-cited benchmark datasets
